title: Analysis of the Relationship Between Participation in Virtual Learning Environments and Mathematics Achievement

context.additional_context: Customized Mathematics Education for Professionals in Vocational Training Institutions Applying Direct Instructional Style in Smartphone-Based Limited Technology Settings

learning_goals: Learners can improve conceptual understanding by completing over 80% of instructor-led learning activities in virtual learning environments (VLE)
Learners can establish personalized learning strategies by analyzing correlations between VLE participation data and math performance
Learners can utilize real-time feedback by completing formative assessments (quizzes/assignments) at least three times weekly on smartphone-based platforms

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
